mapper.insert: insert into coordinator(email, tel, coo_info, link, coo_userid) values(#{email}, #{tel}, #{coo_info}, #{link}, #{coo_userid})
mapper.update: update coordinator set email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, coo_info=#{coo_info} where coo_userid=#{coo_userid}
mapper.select: select count(coo_userid) cnt from member where coo_userid=#{param1}
